spec_data.Name: docbook-utils
spec_data.Description:
This package contains scripts are for easy conversion from DocBook
files to other formats (for example, HTML, RTF, and PostScript), and
for comparing SGML files.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Tue 01 Aug 2017 04:15:11 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Shell scripts for managing DocBook documents
